      • removeSafeZone

        public static boolean removeSafeZone(@NonNull
                     TRSafeZone zone)
        Removes a safezone from the database.
        For GP this also removes [tekkitrestrict] from the managers.
        Do not use this method in a loop. It will cause concurrentmodification exceptions.
        Returns:
        True if the removal succeeded.

                              org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                              @NonNull
                              me.ryanhamshire.GriefPrevention.Claim claim)
        Returns:
        If the given player is allowed to turn the given claim into a safezone.

      • getSafeZoneByLocation

        @NonNull
public static java.lang.String getSafeZoneByLocation(org.bukkit.Location loc,
                                             boolean doGP)
        Uses the database for information.
        Returns:
        A string with information about the type of safezone and its name/owner.
        Returns "" if there is none.
